CH.ifa.draw.contrib
Class FloatingTextArea

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--CH.ifa.draw.contrib.FloatingTextArea
public class FloatingTextArea
extends java.lang.Object

A FloatingTextArea overlays an editor on top of an area in a drawing

<$CURRENT_VERSION$>
